quotes.quote: If you want to know how much I love and care for you, count the waves.
Sweet is true love that is given in vain, and sweet is death that takes away pain.
Love has nothing to do with what you are expecting to get — only with what you are expecting to give — which is everything.
I love your feet because they have wandered over the earth and through the wind and water until they brought you to me.
I love you more than there are stars in the sky and fish in the sea.
You know you're in love when you can't fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams.
One day you will kiss a man you can't breathe without and find that breath is of little consequence.
Hear my soul speak. Of the very instant that I saw you, did my heart fly at your service.
As he read, I fell in love the way you fall asleep: slowly, and then all at once.
yours is the light by which my spirit's born: yours is the darkness of my soul's return —you are my sun, my moon, and all my stars
My heart smiled when you kissed my lips. What a sweet surprise.
I fell in love with her when we were together, then fell deeper in love with her in the years we were apart.
When someone loves you, the way they say your name is different. You know that your name is safe in their mouth.
For you see, each day I love you more, today more than yesterday and less than tomorrow.

I love you without knowing how, or when, or from where. I love you simply, without problems or pride: I love you in this way because I do not know any other way of loving but this, in which there is no I or you, so intimate that your hand upon my chest is my hand, so intimate that when I fall asleep your eyes close
And now here is my secret, a very simple secret; it is only with the heart that one can see rightly, what is essential is invisible to the eye.
When I saw you I fell in love, and you smiled because you knew.
She was ready to deny the existence of space and time rather than admit that love might not be eternal.
There is never a time or place for true love. It happens accidentally, in a heartbeat, in a single flashing, throbbing moment.
He's more myself than I am. Whatever our souls are made of, his and mine are the same.
You are the one girl that made me risk everything for a future worth having.
I came here tonight because when you realize that you want to spend the rest of your life with somebody, you want the rest of your life to start as soon as possible.
But love has no uttermost, as the stars have no number and the sea no rest.
Since I can't be with you right now I will have to be content just dreaming about when we will be together again.
So, I love you because the entire universe conspired to help me find you.
How sweet the words of Truth, breathed from the lips of Love.
The greatest happiness of life it the conviction that we are loved; loved for ourselves, or rather, loved in spite of ourselves.
Love is like the wind, you can't see it but you can feel it.
I know no ways to mince it in love, but directly to say — I love you.
Love reminds you that nothing else matters.
